name: A Devilish Christmas
description:
Something is wrong this year... Nobody is receiving any gifts from Santa! But you know that Santa always delivers his gifts. Knowing that something is wrong, you head out to the Northpole to save Santa and his helpers from the Evil that has possessed them.

Move with WASD, Choose Shooting Direction with Mouse, Pause the game with SPACE.

Music made by Kami2go

Game made by Malkas

This game was made for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition 2022.

Thank you for playing and participating! Merry Christmas!
